short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides users with a variety of data related to Amazon products, such as product pricing, reviews, ratings, and sales rank.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an Amazon Influencer looking to increase your earnings and grow your business? Look no further than Knoxify! 

Knoxify helps Amazon Influencers with the product selection process by quickly identifying products with the highest commission percentages and dollar amounts. Our powerful software simplifies the product selection journey, enabling influencers to effortlessly find the most lucrative products to review and promote to their audience.

With Knoxify, influencers can sort search results based on specific criteria, like commission rates, price, review score, and even whether or not influencer videos are present in the product listing carousel. 

Additionally, the extension provides a convenient pop-up inside of Amazon that presents essential product information, including commission percentage, price, influencer videos present, and ratings, ensuring influencers can make informed decisions about what products to review.

Additionally, Knoxify will provide you with a product “score” that signifies how much potential return a product might garner through shoppable videos. This unique score is generated by combining and assessing the key factors that impact the performance of shoppable videos in terms of exposure and earned commissions.

Elevate your Amazon Influencer journey with Knoxify, by optimizing your product selection process and maximizing your earnings. With its user-friendly interface and robust search capabilities, this extension empowers influencers to save time, boost their earnings, and intentionally buy products that will grow their Influencer business.
